wikipedia_page.main: Peter Davies (born 1 July 1942) is a Welsh retired amateur football inside forward who made one appearance in the Football League for Newport County. He was capped by Wales at amateur level.

response: *Peter Davies (politician) (born 1948), British politician, former mayor of Doncaster
*Peter Davies (born 1956), British participant in the Up Series documentaries
*Troy Davies (Peter Davies, 1960–2007), Australian artist and musician
